item.description:
Dear Members,

Please come to this open rehearsal, where we will continue our training building new skills and refining existing ones. We will learn through critique-driven scenework, drills that force us to 'move' the scene forward, and character development exercise. We will also learn new games and practice the ones introduced during our previous two rehearsals. At the outset, we'll talk a bit about our upcoming fundraising show.

See you soon!
Harish

group.name: Great Boston Chapter of Laughing Matter - Auditions Circle

item.name: Open Rehearsal- Training 2
